import React, { useState } from 'react' const Form = () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ name: "", image: "", life: "", attack: "", defense: "", speed: "", height: "", weight: "" }) const handleChange = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value); setState({ ...state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } return (
{console.log(state)}
) } export default Form
